definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly

sentences.english: Their extremely low temperatures can produce cryogenic burns of the skin and freeze underlying tissue.
sentences.chinese: 它們的超低溫會造成皮膚凍傷和皮下組織凍結。

sentences.english: He was conscious, slightly hypothermic and appeared to have some frostbite.
sentences.chinese: 他很清醒，略有體溫過低的狀況，好像還有些凍傷。

sentences.english: Do not rub frostbitten areas or apply direct heat.
sentences.chinese: 不可揉搓凍傷區域或直接加熱。

sentences.english: Treatment can be painful and involves the gentle rewarming of the frostbitten body part.
sentences.chinese: 治療可能會很辛苦，需要使凍傷的部位逐漸回暖。

sentences.english: And he burns holes in your skin with his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 天氣頻道說暴露的皮膚會在三分鐘內被凍傷。

sentences.english: If the frostbite is only superficial, new skin will form.
sentences.chinese: 如果凍傷只是淺表的，新的皮膚會長出來。

sentences.english: In severe cases, frostbite, and the lesion has ulcerated who can not use this method.
sentences.chinese: 情節嚴重的，凍傷，並有潰瘍病竈誰不能使用此方法。

sentences.english: Every winner , my fingers would be frostbitten . This year is no exception .
sentences.chinese: 每年冬天，我的手指都會被凍傷，今年也不例外。

sentences.english: Is there anything that I should do about the frostbite?
sentences.chinese: 我能做點什麼來預防凍傷呢？

sentences.english: If freeze damage occurs, you should wait until spring before pruning avocado trees.
sentences.chinese: 如果出現鱷梨樹凍傷，你應該等到開春纔可以修剪。

sentences.english: People with minor cases of frostbite that only the skin may not suffer any damage.
sentences.chinese: 凍傷僅僅影響到皮膚的話不會造成永久性的傷害。

sentences.english: She escaped undetected, but with a bad case of frostbite.
sentences.chinese: 最後她躲過了檢查，但卻被嚴重凍傷。

sentences.english: Frostbite should protect the ear, and gradually rewarming , the reconstruction of blood circulation.
sentences.chinese: 凍傷應保護耳廓，逐步復溫，重建血循環。

sentences.english: Frozen tissue is usually pain-free and appears waxy with a possible yellow color.
sentences.chinese: 凍傷的組織通常是不痛的，看起來象黃顏色的蠟一樣。

sentences.english: Sometimes weather is cold hands and feet were frostbitten, and by the cold, got rheumatism.
sentences.chinese: 有時天氣特別冷，手腳都凍傷了，受風寒，得了風溼。

sentences.english: People native to the Arctic have better circulation and avoid frostbite.
sentences.chinese: 北極土生居民血液循環狀況更佳，可避免凍傷。

definition: to kill two birds with one stone (idiom)
rarity/rare delicacy/foreign matter/alien body/the dead/ghost/monstrosity/alien life-form
